metadata.title: Set a global limit on traffic rates
metadata.description: Use global rate limits to prevent excessive rates of requests to Consul servers.

outlineItems.title: Set a global limit on traffic rates
Set a global rate limit for a Consul server

pageHeading.title: Set a global limit on traffic rates

metadata.title: Consul by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Consul is a service networking solution to automate network configurations, discover services, and enable secure connectivity across any cloud or runtime.
